Life taught me that our lives need constant change, and that the secret of life is in its transformation and evolution. Even the earth changed its robe .. And the sky pulled it .. And the sun positions
The unchanging world train is not waiting for it. And those who do not learn will not increase the passage of days
States as individuals need growth, development and constant change. Some governments live in the past, and most of them are struggling with the present, and few who make the future
